TopicTitle: Does anybody know any mods that would be good for making recreations of rl aircraft?

Articles.Content: I like to make fighter jets from real life, but I was wondering if anybody knew any mods (besides BDarmory or airplanesplus) that could help with that.

There are some mods that do help with that, but I think you might be inspired if you check our Fan Works section for some amazing 100% stock builds of highly accurate replicas. 

Moved to add-on discussion.
